S02vjviddhu:4: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān vajreṣu viharati sma /
S02vjviddhu:5: sarvaśarīraṃ vajramayamadhiṣṭhāya vajrapāṇiśca buddhānubhāvena vajrasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
S02vjviddhu:6: tato vajrapāṇiḥ [sarva]buddhānubhāvena sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ [sarvabodhisattvādhiṣṭhā]nañca mahākrodhasambhūtaṃ vajrasāramabhāṣate sma /
S02vjviddhu:7_0: acchedyamabhedyaṃ satyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ sthiraṃ sarvatrāpratihataṃ sarvatrāparājitaṃ sarvasattvavidrāvaṇakaraṃ
S02vjviddhu:7_5: pauṣṭikaṃ sarvasattvānāñca stambhanakaraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca mohanakaram imaṃ mantraṃ
S02vjviddhu:11_0: tadyathā - om truṭa truṭa troṭaya troṭaya sphuṭa sphuṭa sphoṭaya sphoṭaya ghurṇa
S02vjviddhu:11_1: ghurṇa ghurṇāpaya [Vvdh_162] ghurṇāpaya sarvasattvānāṃ vibodhaya vibodhaya sambodhaya
S02vjviddhu:11_2: sambodhaya bhrama bhrama saṃbhrāmaya saṃbhrāmaya sarvabhūtāni kuṭa kuṭa saṃkuṭaya
S02vjviddhu:11_3: saṃkuṭaya sarvaśatrūn ghaṭa ghaṭa saṃdhāṭaya saṃghāṭaya sarvavidyā vajra vajrasphoṭaya
S02vjviddhu:11_4: vajra vajra kaṭa vajra vajra maṭa vajra vajra matha vajra vajra aṭṭahāsanīlavajrasuvajrāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:12: om he fullu nirufullu nigṛhṇa kullu mili cullu kuru kullu vajravijayāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:14: om kaṭa kaṭa maṭa maṭa raṭa raṭa moṭana pramoṭanāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:15: om cara nicara hara hara sara sara māraya vajravidāraṇāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:16: om chinda chinda bhinda bhinda mahākilikīlāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:17: om bandha bandha krodha krodha vajrakilikīlāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:22: om matisthiravajra śrutisthiravajra pratisthiravajra mahāvajra apratihatavajra amoghavajra aihivajra śīghraṃ vajrāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:23: om dhara dhara dhiri dhiri dhuru dhuru sarvavajrakulamāvartāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:26: sarvabalamāvartaya mahābale kaṭabale tatale acale maṇḍalamaye ativajra mahābale vegaraṇa ajite jvala jvala tiṭi tiṭi ti(piṃ)
S02vjviddhu:27: ṅgale daha daha tejovati tili tili bandha bandha mahābale vajrāṅkuśajvālāya svāhā /
S02vjviddhu:31_0: tadyathā - om hara hara vajra matha matha vajra dhuna dhuna vajra daha daha vajra
S02vjviddhu:31_1: paca paca vajra dhara dhara vajra dhāraya dhāraya vajra dāruṇa dāruṇa vajra chinda
S02vjviddhu:31_2: chinda vajra bhinda bhinda vajra hūṃ phaṭ /
S02vjviddhu:33: om hulu hulu tiṣṭha tiṣṭha bandha bandha hana hana amṛte hūṃ phaṭ /
S02vjviddhu:48: te ca sarve ca duṣṭātmā upasargā sudāruṇāḥ //
S02vjviddhu:54: ghaṭaṃ tu rajataṃ cāpi śucivastreṇa vāsitam /
S02vjviddhu:56: japedvidāraṇaṃ mantraṃ yaḥ snāyāt pārthivaḥ sadā /
S02vjviddhu:57: evaṃ yaḥ kurute nityaṃ tasya sampadyate śubham //
S02vjviddhu:58: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
